page.title: 15ORGANISED RECREATION II
page.content: {Bell ringers}meet at Deerhurst Church every Wednesday also on the second and fourth Sunday in every month. The bell ringers ring for weddings at a cost of Â£2 each.There are six bells and about 11 bellringers. {Corse and District Young Farmers Club is held on a Monday night. Various talks are given and trips are arranged. In the winter stockjudging takes place in the different clubs with a disco held afterwards. In April the annual rally is held at Cheltenham Racecourse and in the summer the annual exchange with a foreign club takes place. It is one of the only activities to link the divided area. Other groups in the parish are the {Women's Institute, the Cosy Circle {Club }for senior citizens and the {Royal British Legion}for former members of the armed forces.
